CreateQuotaApplication.title: CreateQuotaApplication
CreateQuotaApplication.summary: Submits an application to increase a quota.

CreateQuotaApplicationsForTemplate.title: CreateQuotaApplicationsForTemplate
CreateQuotaApplicationsForTemplate.summary: Submits a quota increase application for the members of a resource directory by using the management account.

CreateTemplateQuotaItem.title: CreateTemplateQuotaItem
CreateTemplateQuotaItem.summary: Creates a quota template by using the management account of a resource directory. After you create a quota template, if a member is added to the resource directory, the quota template automatically submits a quota increase request for the member. The quota values for existing members remain unchanged.

DeleteTemplateQuotaItem.title: DeleteTemplateQuotaItem
DeleteTemplateQuotaItem.summary: Deletes a quota template by using the management account of a resource directory. After you delete a quota template, if a member is added to the resource directory, the quota template no longer automatically submits a quota increase request for the member.

GetProductQuota.title: GetProductQuota
GetProductQuota.summary: Queries the details of the specified quota.

GetProductQuotaDimension.title: GetProductQuotaDimension
GetProductQuotaDimension.summary: Queries the details of a quota dimension that is supported by an Alibaba Cloud service.

GetQuotaAlarm.title: GetQuotaAlarm
GetQuotaAlarm.summary: In this example, the operation is called to query the details of a quota alert. The details of the alert are returned. The query results include the alert ID, alert name, alert contact, and time when the quota alert was created.

GetQuotaApplication.title: GetQuotaApplication
GetQuotaApplication.summary: Queries the details about a specified application that is submitted to increase a quota.

GetQuotaTemplateServiceStatus.title: GetQuotaTemplateServiceStatus
GetQuotaTemplateServiceStatus.summary: Queries the status of a quota template. You must call this operation by using a management account.

ListDependentQuotas.title: ListDependentQuotas
ListDependentQuotas.summary: Queries the quotas on which a specified quota depends.

ListProductDimensionGroups.title: ListProductDimensionGroups
ListProductDimensionGroups.summary: Queries the dimension groups of an Alibaba Cloud service.

ListProductQuotaDimensions.title: ListProductQuotaDimensions
ListProductQuotaDimensions.summary: Queries the quota dimensions that are supported by the specified Alibaba Cloud service.

ListProductQuotas.title: ListProductQuotas
ListProductQuotas.summary: Queries the quotas of a specific Alibaba Cloud service.

ListProducts.title: ListProducts
ListProducts.summary: Queries the Alibaba Cloud services that support Quota Center.

ListQuotaApplicationTemplates.title: ListQuotaApplicationTemplates
ListQuotaApplicationTemplates.summary: Queries quota templates by using the management account of a resource directory.

ListQuotaApplications.title: ListQuotaApplications
ListQuotaApplications.summary: Queries the details of an application that is submitted to increase a quota.

ListQuotaApplicationsDetailForTemplate.title: ListQuotaApplicationsDetailForTemplate
ListQuotaApplicationsDetailForTemplate.summary: Queries the details of a quota increase application for member accounts in a resource directory.

ListQuotaApplicationsForTemplate.title: ListQuotaApplicationsForTemplate
ListQuotaApplicationsForTemplate.summary: Queries the application records of a quota template that is used to apply for quotas for member accounts.

ModifyQuotaTemplateServiceStatus.title: ModifyQuotaTemplateServiceStatus
ModifyQuotaTemplateServiceStatus.summary: Changes the status of a quota template. You must call this operation by using a management account.

ModifyTemplateQuotaItem.title: ModifyTemplateQuotaItem
ModifyTemplateQuotaItem.summary: Modifies a quota template by using the management account of a resource directory. After you modify a quota template, the modification takes effect only for the members that are added to the resource directory by the management account. The quota values for existing members remain unchanged.
